message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a good share
I think a fair 50/50 split is the best way to go. What do you say, Alice?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Okay Alice, let's meet closer to the middle. This is my final offer.
Getting closer, but I still want a bit more than half
Alice, this is a very fair offer and we are running out of time. I think it's important we both get something!
